mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into order_info (code, drawId, drawExtId, uid, oName, oTel, type, status, orderPrice, info, opName, opId, createTime, modifyTime) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drawId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{drawExtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update order_info set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drawId = #{drawId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, drawExtId = #{drawExtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, oName = #{oName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oTel = #{oTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderPrice = #{orderPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, info = #{info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opName = #{opName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opid = #{opId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyTime = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, drawId, drawExtId, uid, oName, oTel, type, status, orderPrice, info, opName, opid, createTime, modifyTime from order_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, code, drawId, drawExtId, uid, oName, oTel, type, status, orderPrice, info, opName, opid, createTime, modifyTime from order_info
select id, code, drawId, drawExtId, uid, oName, oTel, type, status, orderPrice, info, opName, opid, createTime, modifyTime from order_info where code = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, code, drawId, drawExtId, uid, oName, oTel, type, status, orderPrice, info, opName, opid, createTime, modifyTime from order_info where uid = #{arg0} and status = #{arg1}
